name: A Toad-ally Cool Game
description:
Have you ever wondered how frogs eat? Toad-ally cool game answers this question! Play with your friends! Play with your enemies! In this competitive two-player game, flies will spawn on the map. Each player can control either Froggy the Green frog or Froschy the red frog, jumping onto water lilies. Your goal consists in eating more flies than your opponent.

Froggy controls : A, S, W, D to move, E to extend your tongue

Froshy controls : Arrow keys to move, Right Shift to extend your tongue

Please refresh the page to replay!

We created this game in the context of our very first Game Jam!
